problems.title: Grade Calculator
problems.description:
Calculate and print the grade based on marks using the following criteria:
- 90-100: Grade A
- 80-89: Grade B
- 70-79: Grade C
- 60-69: Grade D
- Below 60: Grade F

Input Format:
Single integer representing the marks (0-100).

Output Format:
Print the grade (A, B, C, D, or F).
problems.examples:
Sample Input
85

Sample Output
Grade B

Sample Input
95

Sample Output
Grade A

Sample Input
45

Sample Output
Grade F

Explanation:
Use if-else if ladder to check marks in different ranges.
hintsList: Use if-else if-else ladder to check marks in descending order (90+, 80+, 70+, 60+, else).
